plot: In a porn filmmaker's obscenity trial, Savannah's scene is shown. The filmmaker seduces his defense lawyer. After the latter proves the prosecutor's ex porn star witness Janna Winters liked her job, Janna seduces the prosecutor.
title: On Trial Part 1: In Defense of Savannah
